mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(a.write_no) FROM 13_t_techqna a JOIN 13_t_tagmapping b ON a.write_no = b.write_no AND b.board_id = '4' AND b.tag_name = #{tagName} WHERE parent_id = 0

SELECT t.write_no ,t.enabled ,t.parent_id ,t.qna_title ,t.content ,t.posting_hit ,t.write_date ,t.update_date ,t.user_id ,u.NICK_NAME FROM 13_t_techqna t join 13_t_user u on t.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE parent_id = 0 /* ORDER BY ${sort} desc */ LIMIT #{offset}, #{sizePerList}

/* 목록 조회 */ SELECT a.write_no ,enabled ,parent_id ,qna_title ,content ,posting_hit ,write_date ,update_date ,user_id FROM 13_t_techqna a JOIN 13_t_tagmapping b ON a.write_no = b.write_no AND b.board_id = '4' AND b.tag_name = #{tagName} WHERE parent_id = 0 /* sort 를 기준으로 분기문을 만들어서 정렬기준을 변경해야 하나 요건이 정의되지 않아 이렇게 마무리 함. */ /* ORDER BY ${sort} desc */ LIMIT #{offset}, #{sizePerList}

/* 상세 조회 */ SELECT write_no ,enabled ,parent_id ,qna_title ,content ,posting_hit ,write_date ,update_date FROM 13_t_techqna WHERE write_no = #{writeNo} UNION ALL SELECT write_no ,enabled ,parent_id ,qna_title ,content ,posting_hit ,write_date ,update_date FROM 13_t_techqna WHERE parent_id = #{writeNo} ORDER BY write_no ASC
